title: Why does politics interfere in science? - Quora

response.answer_text: Politics is an integral part of our administration mechanism. Therefore it has its influence on many things like sports and science on which it should be not. And the most pathetic fact is that normally it has bad effect on these priceless sectors. It interferes because it wants to administer all the sectors whether properly or improperly. Sometimes this politics don't let a best performance coming out from these centres. It's interference is not bad on the pledge that it would never damage the mechanism of that sector in order to fulfil it's own needs.
